notifications.add-found-tag: A new found image has been added for round
notifications.add-mystery-tag: A new mystery image has been added for round

games.games_title: Featuring games from all over the world!

play.send_hello_email: Send an email to ask about how you can start one!
play.game_not_exists: Uh, oh. Does this game not exist.. yet?

profile.name: name
profile.set_name_description: Your name will be unique and only you will be able to make BikeTag posts using this name moving forward. Note: you cannot change your name after you set it.

round.player_name_reserved: It looks like that name is reserved, if that's you please enter your passcode.
round.submit_queue: Share your BikeTag Post for round
round.found_title: Did you find the current Mystery Location?
round.found_text: Add your Found Location image and information below to join the current round of BikeTag! Note: Players must use the same name (case sensitive) in order for their tags to be collected on their profile page.
round.joined_text: Now that you've added your found image, you must bike to a new location and take a picture there. While your found image has been recorded, you haven't completed your BikeTag until you add a new Mystery Location for the next round. The race is on!
round.mystery_title: Next, you must add a new Mystery Location for the next round.
round.mystery_text: Complete your pair of images with the new Mystery Location in order to create a new BikeTag Post
round.mystery_button: Add Your New Mystery Image Now
round.submit_title: Submit your BikeTag Post to win the round!
round.submit_text: You can have the BikeTag RoBot post on your behalf or you can choose to post to other platforms on your own. Once approved, the 'winning' BikeTag Post will become the new Mystery Location to find.
round.submit_text_no_autopost: A BikeTag Ambassador will approve the next round and then your new post will be live!
round.submit_text_manual_social: You can also post your BikeTag to any of the supported platforms from the tabs above, by copying the text within.
round.posted_title: You have successfully completed the round
round.posted_text: Please allow time for the BikeTag Ambassador of the game to approve your BikeTag Post, which can take up to 15 minutes. Thanks for playing BikeTag!
round.approve_text: Please select the winning tag for the round so the game can continue on! This action will save all found images for each player in their BikeDex and will select the mystery image of the winner as the new Mystery Location.
round.empty_text: There are no tags currently in the queue for this round.
round.current_round_description: The tags below are from players who are actively playing RIGHT NOW! Watch the game unfold as players make it from the current mystery location to a new mystery location of their choosing.
round.current_round_description_empty: Tags added to the current round will show up here once the first person has uploaded their found image.
round.approve_agree: By approving this content to be posted to all BikeTag supported platforms, you agree that this submission meets the requirements within the terms of use set by the BikeTag Project
round.user_agree: By uploading content to BikeTag, you agree to the terms of use set by the BikeTag Project

missing_gps_alert.title: Confirm location outside the limits
missing_gps_alert.body: The chosen location is outside the suggested game boundaries. Are you sure you want to continue?

howto.browser_not_support_audio: Your browser does not support the audio element.

swiper1.text1: BIKETAG IS A PHOTO TAG GAME WHERE YOU FIND A MYSTERY LOCATION IN THE REAL WORLD BY BICYCLE.
swiper1.text2: TO PLAY THE GAME YOU NEED YOU UNDERSTAND A FEW THINGS:
swiper1.text3: 1) IMAGES OF BIKES AND UNIQUE THINGS TOGETHER ARE WHAT WE CALL 'BIKETAGS'
swiper1.text4: 2) THE OBJECT OF THE GAME IS TO FIND AND CREATE WHAT WE CALL 'MYSTERY LOCATIONS'
swiper1.text5: 3) THE GAME NEVER ENDS AND EVERY ROUND IS A NEW CHANCE TO PLAY THE GAME.
swiper1.text6: 4) TO COMPLETE A BIKETAG ROUND YOU MUST SUBMIT BOTH A FOUND IMAGE AND A MYSTERY IMAGE.

swiper2.text1: THE PLACE WHERE THE MOST RECENT BIKETAG WAS MADE IS CALLED THE 'MYSTERY LOCATION'.
swiper2.text2: IN THIS EXAMPLE, AN ORANGE-COLORED BIKE IS SHOWN:

swiper3.text1: ONCE YOU ARRIVE AT THE MYSTERY LOCATION YOU MUST CREATE A MATCHING BIKETAG IMAGE OF YOUR OWN. IN THIS EXAMPLE, YOU ARE THE BLUE COLORED BIKE:

swiper4.text1: NEXT, IT'S TIME TO RIDE TO A NEW MYSTERY LOCATION AND MAKE A NEW BIKETAG.
swiper4.text2: KEEP IN MIND, GOOD MYSTERY LOCATIONS HELP PROGRESS THE GAME.

swiper5.text1: GREAT MYSTERY LOCATIONS HAVE UNIQUE, INTERESTING, AND IDENTIFIABLE THINGS. THINK ABOUT WHERE YOU WANT TO GO AND CHOOSE WISELY TO KEEP THE GAME RUNNING SMOOTHLY.
swiper5.text2: GREAT EXAMPLES INCLUDE CREATED OBJECTS LIKE MURALS AND BUILDINGS, AND PERMANENT OBJECTS LIKE LANDMARKS AND NATURAL FEATURES.

swiper6.text1: NOT-SO-GREAT MYSTERY LOCATIONS ARE FEATURELESS, OBSCURE, AND ARE INACCESSIBLE. THEY SHOULDN’T BE HARD TO FIND. DON’T CREATE A BIKETAG THAT IS UNSAFE FOR OTHERS.
swiper6.text2: NOT-SO-GREAT EXAMPLES INCLUDE TEMPORARY AND MOVING OBJECTS LIKE FOOD TRUCKS AND GRAFFITI, PLAIN OBJECTS LIKE CONCRETE WALLS, AND PRIVATE PROPERTY THAT WOULD REQUIRE TRESPASSING.

swiper7.text1: ONCE YOU HAVE THE IMAGES READY FOR THE CURRENT MYSTERY LOCATION YOU CAN SUBMIT THEM HERE
swiper7.text2: PRESS THE PLAY BUTTON AND BEGIN YOUR NEW TAG SUBMISSION

swiper8.text1: AFTER ADDING YOUR FOUND AND NEW MYSTERY IMAGES, YOU CAN SUBMIT THE TAG TO BE POSTED FOR THE NEXT ROUND!
swiper8.text2: THE TERMS OF USE OF THE BIKETAG APP ARE OUTLINED IN THE BIKETAG CODE OF CONDUCT
swiper8.text3: IMAGES YOU PROVIDE WILL BE PUBLICLY AVAILABLE ON THE INTERNET

swiper9.text1: THIS IS THE BOUNDARY MAP FOR THIS GAME. PLEASE BE AWARE OF THE FACT THAT ANY TAGS SUBMITTED OUTSIDE OF THIS BOUNDARY WILL NOT COUNT AND WILL BE REMOVED FROM THE GAME.
swiper9.text2: SOON, YOU WILL BE ABLE TO SEE PINS OF ALL OF THE PREVIOUSLY PLAYED BIKETAG LOCATIONS ON THIS MAP!!

approve.confirm_remove: Removing this Queued Tag will delete the images and the user will be removed from the round. You should only be doing this if the tag images are invalid. When a tag is approved, all queued 'found' images are archived on behalf of that BikeTag Player. There is no need to remove valid submissions.
approve.confirm_approve: Are you sure this is the winning tag?
